title: Circuit breaker
body:
增加了CircuitBreaker：

- 每个Socket中都有一个CircuitBreaker对象
- 在ChannelOptions中新增enable_circuit_breaker开关
- Socket发现CircuitBreaker::OnCallEnd返回false之后调用SetFailed，之后由healthy check thread调用 Reset 来复位。

还存在的问题：
- 只有main socket才需要circuitbreaker，每个socket都有一个circuitbreaker是否有些浪费。
- PR中的默认参数还需要进一步调整。

title: couchbase proposal
body:
实现方案如下
1. 创建一个couchbase channel用来支持couchbase协议
2. 为每个vbucket 建立一个memcache channel
3. CouchbaseServerListener类用来监听couchbase的vbucket map信息，并更新memcache channel
4. 根据每个请求的key值，得到该请求应该在哪个memcache channel上发送。
5. 目前请求不支持pipeline模式

title: Auto concurrency limiter
body:
增加了自动限流：
1.  将 ServerOptions.max_concurrency = 10 扩展了：max_concurrency="10", 及 max_concurrency=“auto”
2.  修改了AddConcurrency, RemoveConcurrency、OnRequested
3.  修改了 ScopedMethodStatus、 OnResponded的接口
4.  增加了constant_concurrency_limiter和gradient_concurrency_limiter，用于并发控制。

title: Http2
body:
主要改动（by zhujiashun）：
1. 增加了flow control部分，对window_size的控制和concurrent_streams等限制的检查
2. 增加了H2中socket管理，在streamId用完时对用户无感，并增加对应的UT
3. 修复若干内存泄漏
4. 根据spec修复一些实现，例如add_window_size函数的实现，_remote_conn_window_size只能被WINDOW_UPDATE帧修改，以及OnGoAway的行为等


test using [h2load](https://nghttp2.org/documentation/h2load-howto.html):
Environment: 
Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-5257U CPU @ 2.70GHz 
4G memory

1. sanity test: 
`h2load -n100000 -c10 -m10 http://127.0.0.1:8010/HttpService/Echo`
result:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4475779/41405371-359a8824-6ffc-11e8-8895-a9d591cb0b18.png)

2. flow control test(using a fixed window):
`h2load --duration=100 -c10 -m10 -W10 http://127.0.0.1:8010/HttpService/Echo`
-Wn: Sets the connection level initial window size to (2**n)-1
result:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4475779/41588952-c6efce28-73e5-11e8-89dc-d872eb37350c.png)

3. stress test: 
`h2load --duration=50000 -c100 -m100 -W10 http://127.0.0.1:8011/HttpService/Echo`
After running 12hours

a) memory
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4475779/41636488-740b9fba-7481-11e8-8dda-43323387e8bb.png)

b) cpu
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4475779/41636515-9433d0be-7481-11e8-859b-1b74e56cad7a.png)

c) resource counting
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4475779/41636610-153766e4-7482-11e8-89ae-28116f8b2804.png)

4. performance test

title: Fix OpenSSL search and librt problems on macOS.
body:
I have tried to compile brpc on my MacBook, but where are some platform compatibility problems in CMakeLists.txt.

OpenSSL on macOS is protected by sysytem and can not be upgraded, and usually most developer use Homebrew installed OpenSSL instead. I try use cmake built-in module `FindOpenSSL` to find include and library of OpenSSL, and set previous used variables correctly.

Another problem is that, librt is not existed on macOS and I add a branch to decide linker parameters by OS type. Some people on stackoverflow said that it is unnecessary to use `-lrt` on Linux. I keep it on Linux branch, for there is no test cases to run and test its compatibility and whether it runs correctly, though I can build it without `-lrt` on debian successfully.

With this fix, cmake can be used to build brpc on macOS.

title: Improve cmake
body:
Improve cmake by:

- Use GNUInstallDirs to determine install directories for better compatibility
- Compile gtest as a subproject which is recommended by gtest team, instead of depending on a pre-built one.
- Add a build option to clone and compile gtest automatically
- Add a cache variable to specify a system-wide gtest source dir for those who do not want to clone
- Generate and install a pkg-config file `brpc.pc` to make depending on brpc easier with build systems that respect the xNIX-standard way (i.e. anything significant except bazel).
- Incorporate protos into cmake dependency system and compile protos at build time. Reconfiguration  no longer recompiles protos and will no longer trigger a huge recompilation.

title: add consul naming service
body:
功能点：

1. 可通过consul获取服务列表。
2. 当consul不可用时可自动降级到file naming service，当consul恢复时可自动恢复到consul naming service。主要是考虑consul不可用时，服务进程又恰好发生重启的场景。其中，服务节点列表文件也是会通过consul自动更新的，里面会保存consul不可用之前最新的下游服务节点。

设计细节：
使用Blocking Queries模式访问consul，即客户端从consul获取服务列表时都会附带当前的index以及超时时间。consul收到请求后若发现请求的index与当前index相等，则阻塞该请求，直到服务列表发生变化或超过超时时间才返回结果。

title: add redis auth.
body: pipelined_count 使用了uint64的16位，考虑到单次请求中不会发特别多的命令数，使用最高位标识这次request是否添加了AUTH命令，导致影响是单次请求最大命令数从最大65535下调到32767

title: 基于Etcd的服务注册和发现
body:
涉及到的修改包括：
1，增加CMakeLists.txt，以方便使用cmake编译（使用前请看CMakeLists.txt的文件头部的注释）
2，增加compile_proto.py，用于编译*.proto文件产生源代码
3，增加基于Etcd的服务注册和服务发现

title: Add thrift protocol for brpc.
body:
Add thrift framed transport with binary message protocol support for brpc.
Tested with thrift 0.9.2 on centos6.7 and ubuntu 14.04, it(both client side & server side) works well on didi's production server for servral months.

title: Not find google/profiler.h when run config_brpc.sh
body:
Add "gtest-devel" from
```
sudo yum install  gflags-devel protobuf-devel protobuf-compiler leveldb-devel
```
change to
```
sudo yum install  gtest-devel gflags-devel protobuf-devel protobuf-compiler leveldb-devel
```
